description: Join us for a private, invitation-only dinner during ConsensusHK. Get immersed in Hong Kong culture while enjoying some of the best the city has to offer paired with thoughtful conversation and high-signal networking among stablecoin founders, infra builders, and capital allocators. Date: Feb 11, 2026 Time: 7:30 PM 10:00 PM Location: TBC What to Expect Intimate seated dinner Senior attendees across stablecoins, payments, infra & capital Priority given to founders, partners, and ecosystem leaders Hosts Kaia Kaia is a high performance public blockchain that simplifies Web3 for users, builders, investors, enterprises, and everyone in-between. Formed through the merger of the Klaytn and Finschia blockchains that were initially developed by Kakao and LINE respectively, Kaia is Asia s largest Web3 ecosystem, with over 420 DApps and over 250 million potential users - all of whom can experience Web3 with the ease and speed of Web2 to connect, create, collaborate, and contribute to the ecosystem. X (Twitter) Instagram Discord Youtube Telegram Facebook Linktree Ratio A global on-chain FX layer custom-built for Asia s financial markets. Ratio coordinates currencies, liquidity, and settlement to power cross-border payments and connect Asia s fragmented financial infrastructure through a single orchestration layer.
